page.title: 18RECREATION(2).CALCOT,READING
page.content: Whilst it is true to say that most people do have television sets,and do spend a great deal of time watching various programmes,it is probably true to say that more people are turning to things in which they can take part. This may take the form of going out to play cards or games with friends,or joining various kinds of clubs.Many middle-aged people go out to play 'Bingo' at proper bingo halls.Most Calcot people travel into Reading to do this,but some enjoy playing at the local school or church hall. Here is a list of activities under- taken by local people:-chess,board- games,fishing,guitar,walking,home- computers,football,tennis,squash,model making,gardening,birdwatching,sailing, swimming,badminton,martial arts, reading,going to the cinema,theatre, discos,and so many more!
